title: Convergence of Outputs When Two Large Language Models Interact in a Multi-Agentic Setup
summary: In this work, we report what happens when two large language models respond to each other for many turns without any outside input in a multi-agent setup. The setup begins with a short seed sentence. After that, each model reads the other's output and generates a response. This continues for a fixed number of steps.
